QuestData.Title: Time For Change
QuestData.Description: <Kherrah listens to you as you explain recent events.>$b$bI agree with the words of the Kolkar Khan. The time for ancient grudges is over. It is a shame that it has taken a demonic crisis to unite the tribes.$b$bI shall return to my father and convince him to join your cause. You have my word that he will comply.$b$bReturn to Khan Leh'prah and inform him that the Gelkis will be ready when called upon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kherrah wants you to speak with Khan Leh'prah.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $r.$b$bAnd not a moment too soon....
